titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for issuance of writs of election in cases of vacancies in the Senate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 3/10/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Requires the executive authority of a State to issue a writ of election to fill any vacancy in the State's representation in the Senate within 90 days after the vacancy occurs.
